definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: But I don't see many battery cars.
sentences.chinese: 但是我没看到许多电瓶车。

sentences.english: Yangshuo can also take the most popular tourist car battery to West Street.
sentences.chinese: 也可乘坐阳朔最流行的电瓶观光车至西街。

sentences.english: Batteries have been replaced, but that wasn't the problem.
sentences.chinese: 电瓶都换了也不解决问题。

sentences.english: I’ve only sparked it a bit to keep the battery alive.
sentences.chinese: 我只发动了几次，防止电瓶没电了。

sentences.english: Most transport is done by electrified waggons.
sentences.chinese: 大部分货物都用电瓶车运送。

sentences.english: Now there is no auto battery cell production enterprise in this region.
sentences.chinese: 目前区内暂缺汽车电瓶生产企业。

sentences.english: But batteries remain the weak point.
sentences.chinese: 但是电瓶还是薄弱环节。

sentences.english: This tester for easy-to-do measurements in battery of electric bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 本产品是一种便携式检查电动车电瓶的仪表。

sentences.english: The lift and car battery supporting converted special equipment for high-altitude operation.
sentences.chinese: 由升降机和电瓶车配套改装而成的高空作业专用设备。

sentences.english: With large battery compartment, batter's installation and maintenance becomes quite XXXXXX.
sentences.chinese: 电瓶箱尺寸宽大，电瓶的安装和保养简单方便。

sentences.english: With large battery compartment, batter's installation and maintenance becomes quite XXXXXX.
sentences.chinese: 电瓶箱尺寸宽大，电瓶的安装和保养简单方便。

sentences.english: The sprayer truck can be miniaturized when the utility model is arranged on a handcart or an electric vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 将其放置在手推车或电瓶车上即可使洒水车小型化。

sentences.english: Battery cars use electric energy as their driving force, which is clean and environmentally friendly.
sentences.chinese: 电瓶车是靠电能作为动力的，安静环保。

sentences.english: Occasionally borrow other people's electric vehicles, to Zhangjiagang urban forward.
sentences.chinese: 偶尔借过旁人的电瓶车，往张家港的市区前行。

sentences.english: We specially manufacture and export electric scooter goods.
sentences.chinese: 我们是专业出口和生产电瓶车的企业。

definition: car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
to leak electricity/(fig.) (coll.) to unintentionally arouse romantic interest (by being solicitous etc)/cf. 放電|放电[fang4 dian4]
